description: All services are logging twice to the console because we have an extra root handler installed
title: services log twice to the console

comments.content: All services are logging twice to the console because we have an extra root handler installed
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/13379
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/13381
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/13379
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/aed10b2c8ba7ce22ae51c6094a6f064e5dcf2b52
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit aed10b2c8ba7ce22ae51c6094a6f064e5dcf2b52
Author: Vishvananda Ishaya <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Sep 20 16:47:53 2012 +0000

    Stop double logging to the console
    
    The code in nova for logging added an extra root handler to be
    able to log messages to the console during log setup. This handler
    was removed in the setup method. The common setup method no longer
    removes this handler, so don't create it. Note that there may be
    a small period before the logging setup is finished where messages
    will not appear.
    
    Fixes bug 1053512
    
    Change-Id: I879360ecd60d607112b1210d7afd5860e9ccb295
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
